example.eg: Although the couple often differ, they are happy together.
example.egtrans: 虽然夫妻俩经常发生分歧，但两人过得很开心。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 持不同看法, 发生分歧

example.eg: As the two books on this subject differ so much, you should definitely read them both.
example.egtrans: 这两本书在这个问题上相异甚远，你一定要两本都读读。

dsense.name: agree to disagree, agree to differ

example.eg: If you can't see things my way we will just have to agree to disagree because I won't change my mind either.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 容许有不同意见, 接受分歧的存在

example.eg: You may think that poor people bring their problems on themselves, but I beg to differ.
This candidate differs from all the others.
Children and adults differ in size and in ability.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在...上不同, 在...方面有所区别
